content: Hello everyone :wave: I'm Gökay. I'm learning Rust for about ten months and I fell in love with it. I decided to join this community because seen a link on Github issue. I want to contribute to Rust, tried to search a few good first issues on gh.Do you guys have any advice on how to get started contributing?
you might try to filter for help-wanted tags or related tag queries with keywords related to issue mentoring
the specific keywords used for this may change depending on the project but most will have this or can be asked about doing it
